file_content.text: I will watch and listen, for the Empire.
You're back. Does that mean... did you kill them? The Shadow Town guards? The vile traitors?
They're all dead.
The sweet justice of the Empire. If only Agent Jalis had lived to see it.
A bit slow, are we?
Your clothes are dirty. And your weapons are still--oh, I see! Very clever!
Now you can leave.
You are kind to spare me. I watch and listen better when I'm breathing.
Shadow Town is now secure. We have served the Empire well. Many thanks!
Those Shadow Town traitors defied the Empire. They deserve death!
Greetings, Imperial citizens. Don't be alarmed--I serve the Empire, like yourselves.
My lord! I am prostrate before you. I am your humble servant. Please, don't kill me!
I know you, hunter. The Imperials talk about you. You do good work for the Empire.
Wait, please, agent. You must be on a very important mission. I will not speak long.
My name is Chiiv. The Empire has been good to me. I repay it by watching its enemies. No one notices me.
I've been watching Shadow Town. Many of the guards there are good Imperials, but some are vile traitors!
That sounds serious.
What do you mean?
The traitors take bribes. They help prisoners escape. They defy the Empire!
I'm not surprised.
You must not know many Imperials, hunter. They are honorable, trustworthy!
So you say, worm.
A fair and wise question, as I told the Empire's interrogators when they asked.
I went to Imperial Intelligence and told them what I saw. They sent Agent Jalis to investigate. Strong, smart, ruthless. A model Imperial!
We identified the traitors in Shadow Town. We found proof of their betrayal. But then the traitors found Agent Jalis. Now he's dead.
You can avenge him.
If only I could! But I am too weak and stupid to defeat an Imperial, even a false one.
And you'll be next.
There are witnesses! They can't kill me in the street! Uh, I mean, not that I'm important--
Pretty smart traitors.
No doubt, hunter. Surely born on some backwater planet, removed from Imperial values--
Are you surprised?
Agent Jalis cannot be blamed. The Empire is law and order. This treachery is unthinkable!
Go to his superiors.
I have great respect for Imperial Intelligence. But they act too slowly. They don't trust me.
Enough storytelling.
The traitors will not stop with Agent Jalis. Now that they have been discovered, they must act to eliminate any other threats.
There are still some guards loyal to the Empire. The traitors will target them next. Then Shadow Town will belong to them.
Over my dead body.
I knew it, the moment I saw you. You are cold, unmerciful--a credit to the Empire!
So what do we do?
I don't work for free.
Protecting the Empire is its own reward, hunter. But I have some credits to spare.
You better have proof.
Even when I can't move, I have eyes and ears that move for me. Absolutely sure.
Agent Jalis tagged the traitors' identification cards. This scanner will pinpoint their locations. You will know exactly who to hit.
You are twice--no, three times the sentient Agent Jalis was. You can find these Shadow Town traitors and destroy them!
I'll wipe them all out.
Don't try to trick me.
No lies. I know what happens when you find those traitors. Nothing I want to happen to me.
I'll wait here, try to contact Imperial Intelligence. Get to Shadow Town before the traitors strike again!
Too risky. [Refuse quest]
Agent Jalis trusted me. And if he were alive today, he would tell you that I... uh, maybe nevermind.
A glorious day to live in the Empire, yes?
